pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, December 9, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, December 9, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Welcoming Ceremony for the Vice President of the United States, Joe Biden.

Confederation Hall (Rotunda)
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage


9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with Vice President Biden.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the First Ministers’ Meeting.

111 Sussex Drive
Victoria Room
John G. Diefenbaker Building
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media must be in the room no later than 9:45
  • Media wishing to cover the FMM events should note the following:
    • Media accreditation is required for all events. Accreditation and facilities open at 7:00 a.m.
    • Media should enter through the east entrance, Sussex lobby


1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the First Ministers’ Meeting

111 Sussex Drive
Victoria Room
John G. Diefenbaker Building
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media must be in the room no later than 12:30


5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability with the First Ministers.  

111 Sussex Drive
Whitton Hall
John G. Diefenbaker Building
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media


7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a working dinner with the First Ministers.

Closed to media.


PMO Media Relations: 
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
